cn.edu.xjtu.se.jackq

Class RandomNumberChooser

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.edu.xjtu.se.jackq.RandomNumberChooser

  • public class RandomNumberChooser
extends java.lang.Object
    Provide static methods as utility to generate random number

    This class only contains static methods and constants, don't instantiate this class.

    Author:
    Jack Q (qiaobo@outlook.com)

    • Method Detail

      • getRandom

        public static int getRandom(int... numbers)
        Generate a random number between 54 and 1 excluding the values passed in.

        This method use Math.random() to generate random number. for the randomness and other constrains notes, refer to Math.random() and Random.

        Parameters:
        numbers - varargs of number which will not be included in random returns. If the values have duplications, the will be regarded as one value. If a value doesn't belong to the range, it will be ignored.
        Returns:
        a random number between 1 and 54 or -1 if there is no possible random value to generate
        See Also:
        Math.random(), Random

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Some test cases for the method getRandom(int...)
        Parameters:
        args - command line parameters
